__ATTN__: Do not edit this file; changes belong in the appropriate YAML file.
overview:
Section tags and End Section tags are used in combination to wrap a section
of the template for iteration

These tags' content MUST be a non-whitespace character sequence NOT
containing the current closing delimiter; each Section tag MUST be followed
by an End Section tag with the same content within the same section.

This tag's content names the data to replaceÂ the tag.  Name resolution is as
follows:
  1) Walk the context stack from top to bottom, finding the first context
  that is a) a hash containing the name as a key OR b) an object responding
  to a method with the given name.
  2) If the context is a hash, the data is the value associated with the
  name.
  3) If the context is an object and the method with the given name has an
  arity of 1, the method SHOULD be called with a String containing the
  unprocessed contents of the sections; the data is the value returned.
  4) Otherwise, the data is the value returned by calling the method with
  the given name.
If the data is not of a list type, it is coerced into a list as follows: if
the data is truthy (e.g. `!!data == true`), use a single-element list
containing the data, otherwise use an empty list.

For each element in the data list, the element MUST be pushed onto the
context stack, the section MUST be rendered, and the element MUST be popped
off the context stack.

Section and End Section tags SHOULD be treated as standalone when
appropriate.

tests.name: Truthy
tests.desc: Truthy sections should have their contents rendered.

tests.name: Falsey
tests.desc: Falsey sections should have their contents omitted.

tests.name: Context
tests.desc: Objects and hashes should be pushed onto the context stack.

tests.name: Deeply Nested Contexts
tests.desc: All elements on the context stack should be accessible.

tests.name: List
tests.desc: Lists should be iterated; list items should visit the context stack.

tests.name: Empty List
tests.desc: Empty lists should behave like falsey values.

tests.name: Doubled
tests.desc: Multiple sections per template should be permitted.

tests.name: Nested (Truthy)
tests.desc: Nested truthy sections should have their contents rendered.

tests.name: Nested (Falsey)
tests.desc: Nested falsey sections should be omitted.

tests.name: Context Misses
tests.desc: Failed context lookups should be considered falsey.

tests.name: Surrounding Whitespace
tests.desc: Sections should not alter surrounding whitespace.

tests.name: Internal Whitespace
tests.desc: Sections should not alter internal whitespace.

tests.name: Indented Inline Sections
tests.desc: Single-line sections should not alter surrounding whitespace.

tests.name: Standalone Lines
tests.desc: Standalone lines should be removed from the template.

tests.name: Indented Standalone Lines
tests.desc: Indented standalone lines should be removed from the template.

tests.name: Padding
tests.desc: Superfluous in-tag whitespace should be ignored.
